Deployable on websites or live chat
Automated updates with latest AI technology

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, enjoy full access to all Standard features of CustomGPT.ai for 7 days without any charges.

faqs.question: How do I sign up for the Free Trial?
faqs.answer: Signing up for the Free Trial is straightforward. Simply create an account and follow the on-screen instructions to start your trial.

faqs.question: What happens after the 7-day trial period?
faqs.answer: Once your 7-day trial period expires, you will automatically be charged for the pricing plan you selected during sign-up.

faqs.question: Is credit card information required for the Free Trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, we require credit card information when you sign up for the Free Trial to reduce fraud and verify that only genuinely interested users are signing up.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my trial?
faqs.answer: Log in to your account, navigate to the billing page, scroll to the bottom, and click the 'Cancel Subscription' button.

faqs.question: What support is available during the Free Trial?
faqs.answer: Support is limited during the Free Trial, but comprehensive documentation is available. For tailored solutions, contact the sales team.

faqs.question: Can I customize my CustomGPT chatbot?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can personalize your CustomGPT chatbot to create a branded experience for your customers and employees.

faqs.question: What happens when I hit my plan limit?
faqs.answer: The system will stop indexing new data or responding to queries. It is recommended to sign up for the correct sized plan based on your data and query volume requirements.

faqs.question: What payment methods are supported?
faqs.answer: CustomGPT supports all major credit cards and debit cards. We secure your payment method using Stripe for your privacy and protection.

faqs.question: Can I integrate CustomGPT with my business applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, the API for CustomGPT enables you to integrate it with your business applications.
